Title: Battlestar Galactica: Blood & Chrome
Writer: Michael Taylor (creator), David Eick (creator), Michael Taylor (teleplay), David Eick (story), Bradley Thompson (story), David Weddle (story), Glen A. Larson (creator: "Battlestar Galactica")
Actors: Luke Pasqualino, Ben Cotton, Lili Bordán, Jill Teed
Plot: The adventures of young William Adama in the First Cylon War.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
